document.full_text: despite hopes that high doses of vitamins c and e might lower a woman's risk of developing a pregnancy complication marked by high blood pressure, a new analysis of the evidence to date finds no benefit.
document.title: vitamins won't prevent pregnancy complication
lines_and_colors: despite hopes that high doses of vitamins c and e might lower a woman's risk of developing a pregnancy complication marked by high blood pressure, a new analysis of the evidence to date finds no benefit.
